text: Herman Krebbers (18 June 1923 - 2 May 2018)Herman Krebbers' obituary was a Dutch violinist. He was born in Hengelo, Overijssel. In 1943 the 19-year-old violinist debuted with the Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra and eventually became the Orchestra's Concertmaster in 1962. In parallel he led a career as a soloist and a chamber musician. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Musicians from Overijssel Category:People from Hengelo Category:Violinists
title: Herman Krebbers
